name: Reality Syndrome
description:
Welcome to reality syndrome!

Press SPACE = Press and HOLD DOWN SPACE

This game was created under 2 days, but I'm happy about the way it turned out.

Let me know your opinion or if you want this turned into a full game (which probably won't happen anyway because of my lack of time)

Game created by me

Music by IceMakerBOI (Main Menu) and Overlord (in game)
